Replace.Text: An expansion of your city center district [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold for every citizen in this city. [NEWLINE]-1 of the primary yield for all basic tile improvments in this city (-1 [ICON_Food] farms, -1 [ICON_Production] mines, -1 [ICON_Food] fishing boats, etc.).[NEWLINE]-10% [ICON_Production] Production towards military units in this city. [NEWLINE]-10 City Defense.
Adjacency: Major yield bonuses from adjacent districts. Provides minor yield bonus for adjacent districts

Provides all tiles within this city with +1 Appeal. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Core Expansion district gains +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production adjaceny bonus from specialty districts.

Adjacency: Major yield bonuses for adjacent Campus, Holy Site, Commercial Hub, Theater, Harbor, Industrial Zone, and Aqueduct districts. Bonus Air Slots and [ICON_Amenity] Amenities for adjacent Aerodrome and Entertainment Complex districts.
